name: 𝗣𝗼𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗲 𝗕𝗹𝘂𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗔𝗿𝗺𝘀
description:
𝗣𝗼𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗲 𝗕𝗹𝘂𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗔𝗿𝗺𝘀 is a FPS shooter game created on Coppercube 6.5.1.  Demo version of first level, become a police officer capture the criminal located in the room to make an arrest. Retrieve evidence bag located inside the room. Also pickup more health and Ammo to stay alive inside the game..

Level 1 - Demo Version

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse - Shoot

Right Mouse - Pistol Wipe

Jump - Space Bar

Press K - Kick down the Door

Game project currently in development...DEMO VERSION ONLY

Updated version 10.8.6 - Added crosshair, Fixed movement, and Decrease footstep sounds.

Updated version 10.8.9 - Fixed Door Kick Down Behavior and Evidence bag.

Requirements:

Minimum:

Ram: 4GB

GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti

Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
